title: Pompeo: U.S. to impose 'strongest' sanctions on Iran
text:
Pompeo: U.S. to impose 'strongest' sanctions on Iran 11:25am EDT - 01:20
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on Monday threatened to impose the “strongest sanctions in history” against Iran if the country’s leadership did not change the course of its foreign and domestic policy.
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on Monday threatened to impose the “strongest sanctions in history” against Iran if the country’s leadership did not change the course of its foreign and domestic policy. //reut.rs/2x1fugT
